website_summaries.verdict: Most buyers who copped the Adidas Fusion Storm are delighted with its performance on and off the hardwood. According to them, the Fusion Storm is a quality basketball sneaker that is also quite stylish and comfortable to wear.Overall, the Adidas Fusion Storm is an affordable basketball shoe that offers a lot of bang for your buck.
pros: Most buyers also love the Adidas Fusion Storm as much as they love the Adidas Dame 5
They give these basketball shoes a high overall rating
A user appreciates how comfortable these mid-top basketball shoes feel on-feet
The Fusion Storm looks great, nearly all wearers assert
They claim that despite being an affordable model, the shoes look more like top-tier models
These mid-top Adidas shoes hug the foot well, a user reports
According to one wearer, these basketball sneakers from the Three Stripes offer great cushioning while walking and running
The Fusion Storm is a quality basketball shoe from Adidas, an owner declares
cons: A buyer gripes that the color of his Fusion Storm looks different in person

customer_reviews.title: Great price leather shoes.
customer_reviews.text: $32 leather shoes Im using for yard work in fall to keep out the Leaf Dust that makes feet very dirty this time of year and sprayed with water proof so my feet will stay dry on the wet and soggy mornings. These could use Dr scholls gel insert they are comfortable but not THAT cushy for all day use. Gave 4 stars not that I care but others might THEY ARE NOT BLACK more of an OFF Grey lol that's right they are a DARK GREYish black so if you need BLACK shoes for work these are not it. but if you don't care and like ugly shoes for working outside go for it. remember NOT BLACK
customer_reviews.author: Nick prunchak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has had 3 pairs of these in the last two years, he wears them to school. He is flat footed and usually has sore feet by the end of the day but not with these. He also has quite wide feet and these are comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kristia s.

customer_reviews.title: Looks much lighter grey
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color in person as in the photos. The shoes are light shiny gray.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Wore them once then tossed them!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these shoes. They fit but look like big bricks on my feet, and were not comfortable! Not even worth the time to return!
customer_reviews.author: R. Desir

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Look, fit, and feel great. Got them for half of what the local store sells them for.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: These looks way cheaper and crappier in person. I wouldn’t wear these - I gave them to my father in law.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Only good for very narrow feet..
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is so narrow, it does not work if you have normal or wide width feet.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Rust

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box came all beat up and had holes and cuts all over. Also, the glue that holds the front of the shoe together was peeling badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9.5/10 and I got a 9 due to lower price and it fit perfectly. Love the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Tomovski

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for good price
customer_reviews.text: Soft, light, comfortable for the price. Genuine leather and textile. But you should know a few things if you want to use it as basketball shoes. These have only cloudfoam on the sole and no rubber. So the grip is really good only on rubber court, I think. These are low style shoes so do not expect high protection on the ankle zone. But I play in them for 3 weeks - I like the stability, duarbility and weight. Also these are great as casual shoes. Pretty soft and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these shoes because they appeared to be used. There were black fingerprint smudges on the soles and also the bottoms of the shoes were dirty . Very disappointed as this was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: nicole madison

product_meta.title: adidas Fusion Storm, Men's Fusion Storm
product_meta.description: Fresh, bold style. These men's shoes bring a basketball look to life off of the hardwood with a mid-profile cut that hugs the foot. They have a smooth leather upper with debossed 3-Stripes. Plush midsole and outsole cushioning ensures a smooth, comfortable ride.
feature_bullets: Soft leather upper is durable and flexible
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite Float sockliner
Combined Cloudfoam midsole and outsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
